statements: UPDATE demand_forecast SET model_name = 'Model A', factors = '{"factor1": 10, "factor2": 20}', forecasted_demand = 100 WHERE forecast_id = '8ccf2fa9-7197-4ffa-b78d-a99365d3a2c1';
